title: League broke
body: I can lose while destroying a nexus. Look at me (Alistair) it shows I destroyed the nexus and the opponents win, PLZ FIX RITO

replies.body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78980883/200204454?tab=overview 
here is the entire overview just so you know
Did you guys finish a surrender vote? This happens a lot when people surrender after they deal the killing blow to the nexus.
Kinda as a joke...lols, still wurf NO REGRETS{{item:3070}}
